text: Alejandro García Casañas (born on 14 January 1970 in Barcelona, Spain) is a Spanish retired professional footballer and a current coach. He played as a defender. As a player, he only got 278 appearances for his 13 years of clubs. He currently coaches FC Dinamo Tbilisi. == Career statistics == Apps Goals 278 6 Category:Spanish football managers Category:Footballers from Barcelona Category:1970 births Category:Living people
title: Alejandro García Casañas
